name: AJ Fernandez - New World - Oscuro - Almirante Belicoso
additionalNotes: The New World Oscuro by AJ Fernandez is a Nicaraguan Puro and the first blend AJ has worked on with his father, Ismael Fernandez, after he left the Plasencia factory. This cigar is a eco friendly cigar. By eco we mean economy friendly. This stick wont hurt your wallet. This box pressed beauty is wrapped in a dark Nicaraguan leaf. Bound with Jalapa tobacco from the famous Jalapa Valley, Nicaragua. The filler is a complex assortment of tobaccos; Esteli-Finca Soledad Ligero, Condega Ligero, and Viso Ometepe. This extremely well-made cigar delivers a spicy and chocolate character buttressed by an earthy, nutty core and a hint of caramel before the herbal finish.
